claim_target: A train accident took place on February 4, 2023, at 8:50 IST when 16 coaches of a Visakhapatnam-Rayagada passenger special train derailed in Kantakapalle and Alamanda railway stations, Vizianagaram district, Andhra Pradesh, India. claim_target: HAL Airport ( IATA : BLR , ICAO : VOBG ) is an international airport serving Bangalore, the capital of Karnataka, India. It is owned and operated by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL), a public–private consortium.

HAL airport Bangalore, owned by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited spreads over 700 acres of land and operational since 1964. Mainly used for test flying of the Design & Development, Manufactured or Overhauled aircraft by HAL for more than 6 decades. In the Year 1980, it was decided to expand the airport facilities for Domestic Commercial Flights which quickly proved very popular and it started handling huge domestic traffic with the help of independent HAL Air Traffic Control team.
edited_claim: HAL Airport ( IATA : BLR , ICAO : VOBG ) is an international airport serving Bangalore, the capital of Karnataka, India. It is owned and operated by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL), a public–private consortium. The commercial traffic was shifted in 2008 but HAL is still operational for test flying of the Design & Development, Manufactured or Overhauled aircraft by HAL for more than 6 decades. In the Year 1980, it was decided to expand the airport facilities for Domestic Commercial Flights which quickly proved very popular and it started handling huge domestic traffic with the help of independent HAL Air Traffic Control team.

claim_target: HAL Airport, also known as Hindustan Airport, is an airport serving Bengaluru, the capital city of Karnataka. Before the opening of the Kempegowda International Airport in 2008, HAL was Bengaluru's primary airport for domestic traffic. At present, the HAL airport operates military aircraft and chartered or VIP flights. It is owned by the government of India and operated by Bengaluru International Airport Limited (BIAL), a public-private consortium . The airport opened in May 2008 as an alternative to increased congestion at HAL Airport, the original primary commercial airport serving the city. It is named after Kempe Gowda I , the founder of Bangalore.
query: Which airport in Karnataka serves select domestic flights and general aviation purposes after the construction of the larger Kempegowda International Airport in 2008?
evidence: Here is a list of airports in Karnataka to ease your research: 1. Kempegowda International Airport, Bengaluru (International) Kempegowda International Airport serves the capital state of Karnataka, Bangalore. The airport is quoted as the third busiest airport after Delhi and Mumbai who handled over 22.2 million passengers last year. The airport was constructed over a stretch of 400 acres of land about 40 kilometres north of the city near Devanahalli village. It is associated with numerous flights with perpetual flights for London , Dubai , Hong Kong , Mauritius along with the domestic flights for Delhi , Mumbai , Kolkata , Goa , Nagpur and much more.
edited_claim: HAL Airport, also known as Hindustan Airport, is an airport serving Bengaluru, the capital city of Karnataka. Before the opening of the Kempegowda International Airport in 2008, HAL was Bengaluru's primary airport for domestic traffic. At present, the HAL airport operates military aircraft and chartered or VIP flights. It is owned by the government of India and operated by Bengaluru International Airport Limited (BIAL), a public-private consortium . The Kempegowda International Airport in Bengaluru opened in May 2008 as an alternative to increased congestion at HAL Airport, the original primary commercial airport serving the city. It is named after Kempe Gowda I , the founder of Bangalore.

edited_claim: Lokapriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport, also known as Guwahati International Airport or IATA code GAU, is the primary international airport serving Guwahati, Assam.
